name: Carbonum Armor
raw: ------------------------------ Forward ------------------------------ You need a different HSR - Sketch and Etch for each piece of this armor. ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Sheet of Curved Carbonum Plating" "156017" #L "Programmed Photon Particle Emitter (Shape Hard Armor)" "162221" HSR - Sketch and Etch (ie : #L "HSR - Sketch and Etch - Chestpiece" "162290") #L "Mass Relocating Robot" "155592" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Programmed Photon Particle Emitter (Shape Hard Armor) + Mass Relocating Robot = #L "Mass Relocating Robot (Shape Hard Armor)" "162218" Skills: | 2.5EE,2.5ME,2.5NP | ------------------------------ Sheet of Curved Carbonum Plating + HSR - Sketch and Etch - Chestpiece = #L "Etched Pattern for Carbonum Breastplate" "162299" Skills: | 4.5ME,CH | ------------------------------ Mass Relocating Robot (Shape Hard Armor) + Etched Pattern for Carbonum Breastplate = #L "Carbonum Breastplate" "162432" Skills: | 4.5CH,2.5EE,2.5INT | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ You can use... #L "Screwdriver" "150922" ...instead of the Mass Relocating Robot (Shape Hard Armor), but skill's requirement is higher like this: Screwdriver + Etched Pattern for Carbonum Breastplate #L "Carbonum Breastplate" "162432" = Skills: | 6ME,5.5EE,2.5INT | Carb armor is great armor, especially when you are just starting out. The NCU buffs can be handy for twinking also. Unfortunately, The Programmed Photon Particle Emitter (Shape Hard Armor) is a Boss-loot-only QL 60 stuff and very rare.
